keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

issues.brexitEurope: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
issues.education: Increased spending on curbing anti-social behaviour, the local economy and education is needed.
issues.governance: We need referendums to hear the local views on the Heysham/M6 link, a bridge across the Bay and future development in Morecambe and Lunesdale.
issues.socialWelfare: Make pension and welfare payments easier to understand and distribute.

leaflet.personalStatement: If elected as MP for Morecambe I would speak up for the people of Morecambe and Lunesdale, independent of the party politics of Labour/Conservatives/Liberals.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSLX-ULXH-JZHT, UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG

images.caption: Please place this leaflet in your window

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please detach this coupon and clean an envelope or write on the Freepost address. No stamp required.
